description: A representation of a logical grouping of personnel resources, equipment resources, physical asset resources, and material that is committed, available, or unavailable for a given process segment for a specific time shall be presented as a process segment capability.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: correspondsTo
contents.description: The process segment related to this process segment capability.

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The nested process segment capability(s) makes up part of this process segment capability as the whole.

contents.name: isACollectionOfPersonnel
contents.description: The personnel capability(s) related to this process segment capability.

contents.name: isACollectionOfEquipment
contents.description: The equipment capability(s) related to this process segment capability.

contents.name: isACollectionOfPhysicalAsset
contents.description: The physical asset capability(s) related to this process segment capability.

contents.name: isACollectionOfMaterial
contents.description: The material capability(s) related to this process segment capability.

contents.name: operationsType
contents.description: Describes the category of the activity
contents.comment: Required attribute. Possible values are: production, maintenance, quality, inventory, or mixed

enumValues.name: mixed
enumValues.comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories of process segments

enumValues.name: committed
enumValues.comment: : capacity that is committed for future productive use.

enumValues.name: unattainable
enumValues.comment: capacity that is not attainable for future productive use given the equipment condition, equipment utilization, personnel availability or material availability.

enumValues.name: available
enumValues.comment: capacity that is available for additional future productive use.

enumValues.name: used
enumValues.comment: a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity with acceptable quality.

enumValues.name: unused
enumValues.comment: a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity that was not used or had unacceptable quality.

enumValues.name: total
enumValues.comment: the sum of used and unused capability or the sum of available, unattainable and committed capability.

contents.name: reason
contents.description: Defines the reason for the capability type.

contents.name: confidenceFactor
contents.description: Measure of the confidence of the ability to obtain the capacity value.

contents.name: startTime
contents.description: The starting time of this capability type.

contents.name: endTime
contents.description: The ending time of this capability type.

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.
